Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

The group of Decepticons travelled a long ways from the bowels of Africa. 
Now, they neared the Predacon base. Until-

Internally, an alarm that was soft & only notified her went off. She listened 
to it, then after a split second of pondering... she growled as her crimson 
optics glowed. "No," she hissed softly.

"Decepticon. Divert path, seems you will see a little action. Follow me,"  
she informed them.

Transforming from her bot mode, into some strange jet mode that had more 
animal features to it that made it difficult to tell if it was a jet. Then she 
rolled to her left, & shot off in the direction of... the Ark!

--part1_165.20a5af19.2c0cb4d4_boundary
